Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier debris on the tracks near Ashland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier debris on the tracks near Ashland.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
